post.author: 고상호
post.content:
A client in mid TORONTO is looking for the following qualified professionals:
A J2EE ARHITECT who will do design work and who likes to write code…you must be prepared to be a “code junkie”. TWO J2EE “code junkies” who have worked with WEBSPHERE, TCP/IP, SSL, MULTI-THREAD, EJB and ORACLE.
The environment is X WINDOWS. If you are interested in these positions, please send resume and salary expectations to neil.russell@rogers.com. Salary is commensurate with experience, but the client is prepared to pay top dollar to qualified candidates. If you are not interested, but could refer a suitable candidate, it would be appreciated.
Neil Russell
E-mail: neil.russell@rogers.com
Office: 905.477.7276
After Hours: 905.889.9826
post.title: PERMANENT JOB OPPORTUNITIES
